title: Again, they nerfed her...again...
body:
Just saw the 10.3 patch on the main website, only to find Akali being nerfed once more. Her Q is more costly, the W I dont mind to much, but her R now locks onto champions. I haven't played the game to see if you can still use it to dash away, but god damn riot. Everyone knows that she is beyond saving at this point, why bother anymore? This nerf can be worked around but why care as to still nerf her? More so, she's on the main website as some sort of mascot (go there and you can see her in the skins portions and the assasin portion if they didnt change it yet) They over use her in songs like KDA and True Damage, which attracts potential players, only to see that akali isnt what she is in the songs. Seriously, revert her or stop bothering with her. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Having a long cooldown on her shroud is no big weakness of its own. It's not hard to use shroud, then maintain your distance until it's up and then use it again.
She's as equally infuriating to play against whether melee or ranged.
Her own passive makes her a ranged champion because a built in sheen + range is somehow a good idea in addition to movement speed. Like come on.

If they nerf her damage, bad players won't be able to carry...not like they can anyway. 

The mentality Riot has is specifically that, to reduce the skill disparity, and without damage, the skill gap is too high, so they take away stuff that's not damage focused while keeping the damage.

Why don't they remove energy from Presence of Mind since only Akali uses that rune from all the energy based champs? Because bad players need that rune to have a chance to play her, so instead they nerf her costs to make that rune mandatory. She still has the extra spare energy from takedowns, so bad players have that handhold.

The only two things they can buff are base stats and damage.

- Base stats = Tank Akali - let's remember how fun that build was to play against
- More damage = Do I really need to point it out why this isn't a good idea?

They shouldn't screw with her R or Q cost. Want to remove all the extra spare energy she has? She's the sole energy user of Presence of Mind, that rune gives her the extra energy, just remove energy from the rune, one problem's solved. Then hit her damage and done, we got back to the balanced Akali, as between 9.19 and 9.22 she was balanced, then Conqueror broke her by giving her all the stats she needs.

There's absolutely things they can buff other than damage and base stats.

They could buff her mobility, giving her a Warwick-esque dash-through on her new R1, so she can fly past the target to cross her passive ring.

They could reduce the cooldown between her R1 and R2.

They could improve her sustain, giving her a tiny heal on her passive autos when they hit a champion.

They could improve her energy economy, perhaps backloading some of the energy you get from her shroud into increased energy regen inside t, or increasing the energy she gets from her passive. 

They could alter how she scales, dedicating her to being an early, mid, or lategame champion.

Oversimplifying the issue doesn't help anybody.

>Oversimplifying the issue doesn't help anybody.

But that's what they want to do with her, make her easy to play for the casuals, as they keep stating the same thing, they want to reduce the disparity.

Anything that makes her more player skill reliant is out of the game by default. Ult cooldown? Sure, but that still translates into a damage buff because she can use execute more often, so my point still stands.
